Description.Value:
This case has been detected as a RedHat case because the OS is RedHat. Please remember that RHEL images are maintained by Microsoft more information at https://aka.ms/rhel-images
For RHUI related questions please read this first
For BYOS related questions please read this first

Text.Value:
If help is required to resolve the issue, please follow the next steps
  • Review any TSG presented, most common scenarios are detected by ASC and it would help most of the times.
  • If you cant get a solution on the case please post your question along with case details and number at Azure Linux Ninjas teams channel and email rhcollab@microsoft.com
  • If you need to initiate collaboration with Azure Linux Escalation support team, Please follow the instructions provided here
  • Make sure a 'sosreport' is collected before engaging the Azure Linux Escalation Team.
